title: Remind me how chat restrictions help reform?
body: All I get are 200 more every time so I stopped caring and only use my messages to talk shit. Id like to be able to reform but being reported at all pretty much guarantees another 200.

Even though you've resorted to trolling, I'll look past it and actually answer your title without being biased towards your dilemma.

Anyways, chat restrictions are made to make it harder to talk to your team. Simple as that. They're not forcing you to reform. They're just showing you that if you act like a 12 yr old who just learned about the internet using mommy's credit card for RP, you're going to get restricted rights. It's up to you how you wish to take it. I've been chat restricted 2 or 3 times, I shit talk alot, all in good fun, but that's still reportable whether I agree or not. I also want to be able to work with my team and win games so I hold back these days.

You clearly stated that you have no intention of reforming, or following the rules of the chat. So the restriction of chat doesn't work on you. Congratulations, you win. Please move on to the next game.
